page.title: 13TRANSPORT
page.content: Most people in our area use {cars}for transport.There is very little public transport.There is a disused canal and disused railway in the area. {Buses.}The nearest bus stations are at{Tavistock}and{Bere Alston.} There is a daily service from{ {Tavistock }to{Bere Alston}and one bus a week from {Morwellham}to{Tavistock.} This goes on a Friday because it is market day and there is a pannier market and a cattle market. There are buses and taxis every day to take the children to school. { Trains}.The nearest stations are at{Gunnislake}and {Bere Alston.}The trains go on a branch line to Plymouth. People who do not have their own car find getting about difficult.
